identity.aesthetic: Steel & Glass - Minimalist Corporate with Industrial Weight

font_family.notes: Strict adherence to Inter. Use weight and tracking to create hierarchy.

modes.dashboard: Bento Grid - High density but breathable

buttons.primary: bg-[#0C765B] text-white hover:bg-[#095E49] rounded-lg shadow-sm transition-all duration-200 active:scale-95

cards.glass: bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/40 shadow-sm rounded-xl hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300

inputs.default: bg-slate-50 border-slate-200 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#0C765B]/20 focus:border-[#0C765B] rounded-md

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use extensively for overlays, sticky headers, and modal backgrounds. Key: High blur (backdrop-blur-xl), slight transparency (bg-white/80), and delicate white borders.
visual_enhancers.gradients: Use subtle mesh gradients of Steel Green (#0C765B) fading into white/slate for hero backgrounds. NO full-screen solid primary colors.
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on solid backgrounds to reduce digital sterility.

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -10 }}

hero_background.alt: Modern steel factory interior with pipes and machinery

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure #0C765B text is never on dark backgrounds without white backing. Use white text on #0C765B backgrounds.
accessibility.interactive_elements: All interactive elements must have a :focus-visible ring offset.

universal_guidelines: Do NOT use 'Inter' for everything blindly; use tight tracking for headings to give it a 'Display' feel.
Avoid generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry to create visual interest.
Use glassmorphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Never use AI assistant emoji characters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attribute.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building the PT Garuda Yamato Steel Intranet. Use the colors and images defined here. Strictly follow the glassmorphism aesthetic for the dashboard cards. Implement the News Ticker at the footer as requested. Use Shadcn components for complex interactions but style them to match the Steel Green identity.
